description: This file defines API route handlers for user-related endpoints, specifically for retrieving the current user's profile via the '/me' endpoint. It utilizes FastAPI's APIRouter, dependency injection, and external utility functions for token verification and database access.

methods.name: str _extract_bearer(auth_header: Optional[str])
methods.description: Extracts the bearer token from the Authorization header, raising HTTP 401 if header is missing or malformed.

methods.name: UserProfile get_me( authorization: Optional[str] = Header(default=None, alias="Authorization"), db: sqlite3.Connection = Depends(get_db_conn), )
methods.description: API endpoint handler for '/users/me' which authenticates the user via bearer token, verifies it, and returns the user's profile or appropriate errors.
